headline: What Investors Should Know About AT&T’s (T) Ex-Dividend Date in October
summary: AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) is included among the Best High Yield Stocks to Buy in October. AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) is a major US telecom, serving consumers and businesses with wireless, wireline, and now fiber internet. headline: AT&T Selects STREAMWIDE to Power the FirstNet Next-Generation Mission-Critical Application for Public Safety in the U.S.
summary: PARIS, September 30, 2025--AT&T selects STREAMWIDE to power the FirstNet next-generation mission-critical application for public safety in the U.S.

headline: Hiya Launches Caller Reputation, the First ‘Credit Score’ for Business Calls
summary: SEATTLE, September 30, 2025--Hiya, a global leader in voice intelligence services, today announced the launch of Caller Reputation, the industry’s first caller report card. In cooperation with AT&T, and in service of a healthier voice ecosystem, Hiya is making spam label status available to all businesses at no cost.

headline: EchoStar Shares Jump on Talks to Sell Spectrum to Verizon
summary: The talks involve EchoStar’s AWS-3 licenses, valuable for carrying 5G wireless signals, according to people familiar with the situation, who asked to not be identified because the discussions are private.  EchoStar put a carrying value of $9.8 billion on the spectrum, according to a regulatory filing.

raw.headline: EchoStar Shares Jump on Talks to Sell Spectrum to Verizon
raw.summary: The talks involve EchoStar’s AWS-3 licenses, valuable for carrying 5G wireless signals, according to people familiar with the situation, who asked to not be identified because the discussions are private.  EchoStar put a carrying value of $9.8 billion on the spectrum, according to a regulatory filing.

headline: Verizon explores deal for EchoStar’s AWS-3 spectrum licenses - report
summary: Investing.com -- Verizon Communications is in talks with EchoStar Corp. to acquire part of its wireless spectrum, Bloomberg News reported Tuesday, citing sources familiar with the discussions.

raw.headline: Verizon explores deal for EchoStar’s AWS-3 spectrum licenses - report
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Verizon Communications is in talks with EchoStar Corp. to acquire part of its wireless spectrum, Bloomberg News reported Tuesday, citing sources familiar with the discussions.

headline: Five Star Electric Awarded Electrical Package for the Passaic Valley Sewerage Commission Standby Power Generator Facility
summary: NEW YORK, September 30, 2025--Tutor Perini Corporation (NYSE: TPC) (the "Company"), a leading civil, building and specialty construction company, announced today that its subsidiary, Five Star Electric, has been awarded an electrical subcontract by Skanska/Railroad SPGF JV for the Passaic Valley Sewerage Commission ("PVSC") Standby Power Generator Facility.
